scripts.bbuild: npm run build -w shared && npm run build -w server
scripts.vercel-build: npm install --include=dev && npm run build -w shared && npm run build -w client && npm run build -w server && npm run postbuild
scripts.postbuild: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); if(!fs.existsSync('public'))fs.mkdirSync('public',{recursive:true}); const copyDir=(src,dest)=>{if(!fs.existsSync(dest))fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true}); fs.readdirSync(src).forEach(file=>{const srcPath=path.join(src,file); const destPath=path.join(dest,file); if(fs.statSync(srcPath).isDirectory()){copyDir(srcPath,destPath)}else{fs.copyFileSync(srcPath,destPath)}})}; copyDir('client/public','public'); copyDir('client/dist','public');"
